short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automates LinkedIn job applications by submitting to pre-set positions, saving you from manual searching and applying.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rasily is an extension that makes the job application process on LinkedIn quick and convenient. It automatically fills out and submits job applications using information from your resume and data stored on our server.
Why choose Raisly?
1. Streamlined Process: Automatically applies to job openings without the need to manually search and fill out forms.
2. Application Tracker: Stay organized with our customizable, downloadable tracker, which allows you to keep a record of all your job applications.
3. Data Privacy: The data you provide is used solely for automating the application process and is not used for other purposes.
4. User-Friendly: Easy installation and simplicity in use for a quick start.
Use Raisly to make your job search more efficient and less time-consuming.
